title: ➤Huge 6 Bedroom Apartment in Allston! No Broker Fee! Ava. 9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 285739883', 'Rent: $5,490 / Month', 'Beds: 6', 'Bath: 2.5', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Giant 6 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment in Allston is now available to tour!', "Close to Packard's Corner and moments away from lots of restaurants and shops!", 'Public transit is easily acsessible close by too!', 'This unit features:', '- Hardwood floors', '- Spacious rooms', '- Updated kitchen', '- Dishwasher', '- Renovated bathrooms', '- Laundry in the building', 'Cat friendly, parking may be available for rent at an extra $100/month.', 'Available for a 9/1 move-in, and owner will pay the broker fee!', 'Reach out now for more info!', 'Please email Terry or respond to this ad to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!', 'Email: Terry @ benjaminapartments .', 'com (Remove the spaces)', 'Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent', 'Nearby transportation:', 'Bus: 57 Brighton Ave @ Linden St (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Cambridge St @ Linden St (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 64 Cambridge St @ Linden St (0.11 mi)', 'Tram: B Harvard Avenue (0.31 mi)', 'Bus: 66 Cambridge St @ Franklin St (0.16 mi)', 'FEATURES', 'Eat-In Kitchen', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Microwave', 'Oven/Range', 'Refrigerator', 'Storage', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
